/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, gazing down the length of the street. The street itself is flanked by brick buildings, their red roofs adding a warm hue to the scene. Power lines crisscross above, forming a network against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly in the top left corner of the image, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a soft glow. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky. The overall effect is a sense of depth and perspective, drawing the viewer into the scene.
